summary: A survival tale of two lovers, who tries their best to escape a jungle which is governed by a cold blooded dacoit.
cast: Sunil Shetty|Fardeen Khan|Urmila Matondkar|Sushant Singh|Kashmira Shah|Rajpal Yadav|Raju Kher|Himanshu Malik|Avtar Gill|Makrand Deshpande|Manmeer Singh|Vijay Raaz|Swati Chitnis|Anil Yadav|Ram Awana|Ashraf Ul Haq|Sanjay Kumar|Gurinder Makna|Ganny Nighanda|Deep Raj Rana|Nawazuddin Siddiqui|Manmeet Singh|Dinesh Thakkerr
title: Jungle
